result.name: hartland-point-to-tintagel-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
Two surveys of Hartland Point to Tintagel rMCZ site have been completed to 
date (May 2013):

Cruise: Cefas_cend0113y

Date: 21st January 2013 - 23rd January 2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100%

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100%

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 41 video transects - Usable

PSA Samples to date: 8

Infauna Samples to date: 31

Cruise: EA_sngn0313

Date: 18th February 2013 - 2nd May 2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100%

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100%

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 57 video transects; 904 stills analysed - 
Usable

PSA Samples to date: 21

Infauna Samples to date: None acquired

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Hartland Point to Tintagel Marine Conservation Zone (MCZ) Survey Data
